msg.msgText: imaserver user list "Item1=value" ... SYNTAX: imaserver user list help imaserver user list "Item1=value" ... EXAMPLE: imaserver user list "UserID=webUser1" "Type=WebUI" imaserver user list "Type=Messaging" "Count=50" Configuration items are: UserID The user ID. If not specified, all users will be listed. Type The user type. Only [WebUI] or [Messaging] are allowed. Count The number of user entries to be displayed on the screen at a time. NOTES: 1. "Type" is a required item. 2. All "Key=value" pair must be enclosed within double quotation marks.

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
